title: Bug 112458Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switch to Master page viewer.
description: Bug 112458Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switch to Master page viewer. Description:Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switch toMaster page viewer.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: This will confuse customers if theythought it as Master Page Editor and set properties without click Master Pageviewer at first.
EB: Switch to Master Page.Expected result:Property Editor changs to reflect Master Page properties.Actual result:It still showed the label's properties.
SR: New a report and insert a label.2. Select the label. (Property Editor shows label's properties)3.
